LIF cytokine essential development central nervous system , recently show rat maternal LIF stimulate placental ACTH turn promote secretion fetal LIF nRBC , turn promotes brain development fetus Other study IUGR ( Intra Uterine Growth Restriction ) show IUGR fetus CP ( Cerebral palsy ) AGA ( Average Gestational Age ) The hypothesis LIF relate proper development nervous system fetus test cord blood embryo IUGR placenta find change LIF ACTH compare AGA fetus level . Studies also show relationship CP IUGR , mechanism relationship unclear . The purpose research see relationship level LIF IUGR fetus compare level LIF AGA fetuses , one two way : - Changes secretion ACTH placenta - Changes level LIF umbilical cord blood
